subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hedo Turkoglu scored 24 points, Dwight Howard overcame a slow start to collect 19 points and 14 rebounds, and the host Orlando Magic beat the Toronto Raptors, 102-87.
snippet: Hedo Turkoglu scored 24 points, Dwight Howard overcame a slow start to collect 19 points and 14 rebounds, and the host Orlando Magic beat the Toronto Raptors, 102-87.
